DocAttribute.Name: DailyInteraction
DocAttribute.Documentation: Number of interactions occurring on a daily basis.

DocAttribute.Name: ImportanceRating
DocAttribute.Documentation: Represents the level of importance of interaction. 0 represents lowest importance, 1 represents highest importance.

DocAttribute.Name: LocationOfInteraction
DocAttribute.Documentation: The location where this interaction happens.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedSpaceProgram
DocAttribute.Documentation: Related space program for the interaction requirement.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingSpaceProgram
DocAttribute.Documentation: Relating space program for the interaction requirement.
